channel.title: The Nick & Gareth Podcast

image.title: Nick Peters & Gareth Senior - Music Podcast

channel.itunes:subtitle: It's two men, in a room, playing records and talking about them.
channel.itunes:author: Gareth Senior, Nick Peters
channel.itunes:summary: A smattering of classic indie, some alt-country, some loud punk and whatever else takes our fancy really. There's insight and analysis, drunken dewy-eyed nostaligia, swearing and some funny stories.
channel.description: A smattering of classic indie, some alt-country, some loud punk and whatever else takes our fancy really. There's insight and analysis, drunken dewy-eyed nostaligia, swearing and some funny stories.

item.title: Nick And Gareth Podcast - Season 1, Episode 11 - Water
item.itunes:subtitle: We discuss songs with a watery theme.

item.itunes:summary: Two fellas discuss songs with the theme of 'water'
item.description: Two fellas discuss songs with the theme of 'water'
item.itunes:keywords: glam folk indie elephant six music hanoi smog
